comment_output: Set group_tasks_by to 0 (or omit) to create individual reports per task. Set to N (e.g., 4) to group N tasks into one combined report.
comment_model_version: Model version to use for video generation. Options: 'v1.6', 'v2.1'. Default is 'v2.1'.
comment_generation_count: Global default: Number of videos to generate per pair. Can be overridden per task. Default is 1.

schedule.comment: Time format: HH:MM (24-hour format). Leave empty to start immediately

tasks.prompt: 鏡頭圍繞單一女子運鏡，鏡頭帶到女子身後，在女人回眸的那一刻，動作自然優雅。隨著她的動作與回眸，原本身上的服裝瞬間變化，布料如流光般轉換成華麗服飾，同時耳邊出現閃耀的精緻耳環。整個過渡過程流暢無縫，光影變化柔和富有層次。女子的表情自信而迷人，姿態穩定優雅。畫面中始終只有這位女子，無任何其他角色或人物出現。
tasks.negative_prompt: 出現兩個人、角色替換、分身、換人
tasks.comment: Processes image pairs (A and B) in the Source folder to generate videos transitioning from start frame to end frame

tasks.prompt: 大量櫻花花瓣從畫面中央緩辦地綻放，並從花瓣中綻放出少女，少女從花瓣中出現，她看向鏡頭，風吹動她的頭髮，圍繞主體運鏡

猛烈的火焰從猛禽的身體開始燃燒，毛髮被火焰吞噬並逐漸轉化成金屬質感。牠靜止於烈焰之中，像在感受體內湧動的力量。隨著熱浪翻湧，牠緩緩抬起頭，眼中燃起炙烈光芒。火焰順著牠的頸部與胸口蔓延，牠的頭部微微擺動、雙翼緩緩張開，動作自然而有節奏，如同在呼吸般與火焰共鳴。當火焰達到最盛時，牠深吸一口氣般張開嘴，發出低沉而震撼的吼聲——但嘴部完全為封閉式金屬結構，沒有任何牙齒或生物特徵，只有純粹的火焰與光在其中閃耀。火焰從金屬喙的縫隙間流出，光隨呼吸閃動。隨著每一次振翅與呼吸，火焰在牠的身上流動、冷卻、凝結成金屬裝甲，羽毛逐層轉化為鋼鐵與機械結構。光線在金屬與火焰之間閃爍流動，牠的身軀漸漸穩定、挺立於餘燼之中。最終，烈焰化為光，留下閃耀冷冽的鋼鐵身軀——一隻自火焰中重生的機械猛禽。整體氛圍充滿力量、平衡與重生之美，具電影級光影效果。

comments.endframe_usage: This endpoint generates videos from pairs of images (start frame A and end frame B). Place image pairs in the Source folder with naming pattern: 'Name_A resolution.ext' and 'Name_B resolution.ext'
comments.output_grouping: Set output.group_tasks_by to 0 (or omit) to create individual reports per task. Set to N (e.g., 5) to group N tasks into one combined report. Example: with 5 tasks and group_tasks_by=5, creates 1 report containing all tasks.

pairing_modes.ab_naming: Default mode. Pairs images based on A/B naming convention (e.g., 'Style_A 1024x1024.jpg' with 'Style_B 1024x1024.jpg')
pairing_modes.sequential: Alternative mode. Pairs images by sorted filename order. First half of images become start frames, second half become end frames. Example: with 6 sorted images, pairs are (1,4), (2,5), (3,6)

comments.generation_count: Can be set globally at the project level OR per-task. Task-level setting overrides global setting. Set to a number (e.g., 6) to generate [filename]_generated_1.mp4 through [filename]_generated_6.mp4. Default is 1.

parameters.cfg: CFG scale value (0.0-1.0) - controls how closely the generation follows the prompt. Default: 0.5
parameters.model_version: Model version to use - 'v1.6' or 'v2.1'. Set globally or per task
parameters.generation_count: Number of videos to generate per pair. Can be set globally (applies to all tasks) or per-task (overrides global). Default: 1

global_generation_count.comment: When generation_count is set globally, all tasks use that count unless overridden
global_generation_count.note: Set 'generation_count': 3 at the top level to generate 3 videos per pair for ALL tasks

default_single_generation.comment: Standard A/B pairing with single generation per pair

multiple_generations.comment: Generate 6 videos per pair with A/B naming (overrides global setting if present)

sequential_pairing.comment: Use sequential pairing for images without A/B naming

sequential_with_multiple_generations.comment: Combine sequential pairing with multiple generations

grouped_report.comment: Group all 5 tasks into one combined report by setting output.group_tasks_by to 5. This creates a single presentation with all tasks instead of 5 individual presentations.
grouped_report.note: Set 'group_tasks_by': 5 in the 'output' section at the top level to enable this feature.
